casebody.data:
Third Department,

February, 1968

(February 6, 1968) Severyn J. Hasbrouck, Appellant, v. State of New York, Respondent. (Claim No. 42979.)

Motion to amend decision (28 A D 2d 1195) granted to the extent of awarding costs to claimant to abide the event, without costs. Gibson, P. J., Herlihy, Reynolds, Aulisi and Staley, Jr., JJ., concur.
